data.text: @apeyton_smith COVID has made everything tough, but you are very accomplished, strong, brave, and like most faculty, optimistically overextended. I found a plus side of getting COVID recently is enjoying a lot less caution and worry in my daily activities, hopefully you find the same.👍🏻

Didn’t mean to post such an emo message/pic! I just thought that the image embodied exactly how I felt when getting the + result phone call. #SystemOverload #Done 
I am thankfully over the worst part and just trying to manage the fatigue
@apeyton_smith You're being the best you, virtual or in person.
@hangrystarr You’re too sweet (and must not have talked with my previous boss 😉). Miss you and hope all is well!
@apeyton_smith so sorry you got sick on top of all that--too much.  take care of you first!
@apeyton_smith Sending you lots of 👍❤️ and wishes for a speedy recovery, Dr. Smith!
@apeyton_smith Thank you for being you! And still showing up anyway <3
